reboot_router: (ubus call system reboot 2>/dev/null || /sbin/reboot || busybox reboot || reboot -f || reboot) >/dev/null 2>&1
restart_ap: (wifi reload || wifi up || /etc/init.d/network reload || /etc/init.d/hostapd restart || true) >/dev/null 2>&1
reconnect_4g: (ip link set dev {iface} down 2>/dev/null || ifconfig {iface} down 2>/dev/null || ifdown {iface} 2>/dev/null || ifdown wan 2>/dev/null || true) && sleep 2 && (ip link set dev {iface} up 2>/dev/null || ifconfig {iface} up 2>/dev/null || ifup {iface} 2>/dev/null || ifup wan 2>/dev/null || true)
